Package TuitionManager

Class TuitionManager

java.lang.Object
TuitionManager.TuitionManager
public class TuitionManager
extends java.lang.Object
Class to handle the I/O for the project and manage the functionalities and flow of the other classes. Will issue add/remove and print commands to be carried out by other classes. Will create the objects, based on input, that tasks will be carried out on.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      method that will be called to run the project.

    • addNewStudent

      private void addNewStudent​(char studentType, java.lang.String studentDetails)
      Adds a new student to the running list within this class.
      Parameters:
      studentType - Type of student to add (I)nstate, (O)utstate, I(N)ternational
      studentDetails - String that contains details inputted as part of command

    • addNewInstateStudent

      private void addNewInstateStudent​(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, int credits, java.lang.String fundString)
      Adds specifically an Instate student to the list.
      Parameters:
      firstName - Students First name
      lastName - Student's las name
      credits - Number of credits student is taking
      fundString - funding for Instate student, is type-specific data

    • addNewOutstateStudent

      private void addNewOutstateStudent​(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, int credits, java.lang.String tristateString)
      Specifically adds an Outstate student to the list. Gets first name - credit from calling method and parses type-specific string tristateString to obtain a boolean value.
      Parameters:
      firstName - Student's firstname
      lastName - Student's last name
      credits - number of credits the student is taking
      tristateString - String represantion of wheter student lives in tristate area or not, type-specific data

    • addNewInternationalStudent

      private void addNewInternationalStudent​(java.lang.String firstName, java.lang.String lastName, int credits, java.lang.String exchangeString)
      Helper method to add new International students to the running list.
      Parameters:
      firstName - Student's first name
      lastName - Student's last name
      credits - Student's credits
      exchangeString - Is student an exchange student or not, boolean in string form, type-specific data

    • getBooleanValue

      private int getBooleanValue​(java.lang.String boolString)
      Helper method to parse string containing type-specific-data for booleans from input to determine which (if any) boolean value is being provided as input.
      Parameters:
      boolString - String containing the boolean input, either "T" or "F"
      Returns:
      int: 1 if true, 0 if false, -1 if not proper input format

    • removeStudent

      private void removeStudent​(java.lang.String studentInfo)
      Removes given student from the running list in this class
      Parameters:
      studentInfo - Student's first and last names as a string

    • handleBadCommands

      private void handleBadCommands​(java.lang.String command)
      Handles bad commands inputted into the command line.
      Parameters:
      command - identifier for certain bad commands, if they are lower case for example

    • printCommand

      private void printCommand()
      Prints a list of Students and the tuition amount due for each
